thread.title: Don't stay here if you need a fridge
thread.title_full: Don't stay here if you need a fridge - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: tonispera
title: Don't stay here if you need a fridge
text: Great location and provided the basic necessities but I needed a fridge in my room for my medication and none was available. I was told I could store medication in the main fridge with access to other guests. Obviously that's not a solution for fear of someone tampering / even taking my medication. Otherwise the hotel was good. Was here for business so didn't have time to enjoy the facilities like the indoor pool.
